Desc.Range: hurls a car with all their might.
Desc.Charge: rushes at their foe, fits flailing.
Desc.Pummel: lets fly with a barrage of awesome punches.

Desc.Charge: charges their foe at an impossible speed.
Desc.Pummel: punches wildly, their fists a blur.
Desc.Parry: ducks an attack and delivers one of their own.
Desc.Mega: kicks faster than the eye can see.

Desc.Charge: swoops at their enemy, flying hard and fast.
Desc.Pummel: strikes repeatedly, floating out of range.
Desc.Parry: tumbles out of the way before striking back.
Desc.Mega: lifts them into the air and slams them to the ground.

Desc.Range: throws a bus using only their mind.
Desc.Charge: runs forward surrounded by a cloud of glass shards.
Desc.Pummel: hurls a swarm of rocks and debris.
Desc.Parry: holds their foe while striking hard.
Desc.Mega: crushed them under the rubble of a skyscraper.

Desc.Charge: runs fast, the air superheating around them.
Desc.Pummel: strikes fast with fists of flame.
Desc.Parry: throws smoke and flames in their eyes.
Desc.Mega: claps their hands, creating a mighty explosion.

Desc.Charge: moves fast, hardening their skin as they tackle their foe.
Desc.Parry: blocks with an iron arm before striking with their foot.

Desc.Range: blinks in and out of range, striking hard.
Desc.Parry: dodges an attack, only to counter from above.
Desc.Mega: teleports them in front of an oncoming bus.

Desc.Range: throws debris from an unknown position.
Desc.Charge: runs hard, treading softly, striking viciously.
Desc.Parry: easy dodges an attack before replying in kind.
Desc.Mega: strikes at their throat and goes for the eyes.

Desc.Range: kicks a car, sending it flying at their enemy.
Desc.Charge: grows and shrinks, throwing off their foe before slamming them.
Desc.Pummel: doubles in size before punching rapidly.
Desc.Parry: shrinks, dodging the attack before attacking their eyes.
Desc.Mega: clutches them with a giant fist.

Desc.Range: vomits a blob of slime at their enemy.
Desc.Charge: hurls toxic goo while they charge.
Desc.Parry: sprays a corrosive mist in their eyes.
Desc.Mega: bits hard, feeling the venom enter their veins.
